page.title: 15RECREATION -LEISURE TIME
page.content: In the Ballifield Area - square 4286 the people questioned replied as follows:- 31% considered sport their main leisure time activity 27% enjoy gardening as their main hobby 13% said that reading was their main pastime and 12% watched television as their main leisure activity. The remainder questioned listed cricket, birdwatching, music and visiting the local pub as their main interest. The usual Saturday evening activities were given as follows:- 28% stayed at home with the family; 30% stayed at home watching T.V.or video; 32% visited the local pub or club; 10% did not say.
